title: Could ChatGPT convince you to buy something? AI companies gear up to sell ads
description: Eighteen months ago, it was plausible that artificial intelligence might take a different path than social media. Back then, AI’s development hadn’t consolidated under a small number of big tech firms. Nor had it capitalized on consumer attention, surveilling users and delivering ads. title: Artificial Intelligence: Revolutionizing Every Aspect of Life - Elon Musk's Legal Battle: A Demand for Billions from OpenAI and Microsoft
description: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is rapidly redefining the way we live, work, and interact. No longer confined to the realm of science fiction, AI is now a driving force behind innovations across all sectors— from healthcare and finance to entertainment and manufacturing. Its impact is far-reaching, transforming industries, reshaping economies, and influencing the way we navigate daily life.

title: Netweb Technologies Q3 profit jumps multifold to Rs 733 crore
description: Netweb Technologies Q3 Earnings | Performance was driven by demand for artificial intelligence, growth in private cloud and high performance computing solutions.
content:
High computing solutions firm Netweb Technologies on Saturday posted its highest-ever quarterly profit with about a two and half times jump in profit after tax (PAT) at Rs 733.1 crore in the October-December period.

title: AI tools speed development of antibody probes to see activity inside living cells
description: Researchers at Colorado State University have determined how to use artificial intelligence to modify antibodies so they act as lightbulbs, enabling scientists to better see inside living cells to track errors in gene expression that can lead to cancer and other disorders.

title: Cases of 'AI Psychosis' Are Being Reported. How Dangerous Is It?
description: Artificial intelligence is increasingly woven into everyday life, from chatbots that offer companionship to algorithms that shape what we see online.
content:

title: AIX Ventures cofounder Shaun Johnson departs

title: Nvidia H200 chip parts suppliers halt output after China blocks shipments
description: SUPPLIERS of parts for Nvidia’s H200 have paused production after Chinese customs officials blocked shipments of the newly approved artificial intelligence processors from entering China, the Financial Times reported on Friday.
content:

title: Agentic AI: The Force Multiplier Philippine CISOs need now
description: ARTIFICIAL intelligence (AI) has become an accelerant in cybersecurity, empowering defenders while also supercharging adversaries. Threat actors are already weaponizing agentic AI to orchestrate adaptive, autonomous attacks that move at machine speed. Phishing campaigns evolve in real time, malware rewrites itself midstrike, and deepfakes impersonate executives with increasing precision.
